thread.title: Meek Mill & Nicki Minaj Like Instagram Comments Making Fun Of One Another
thread.title_full: Meek Mill & Nicki Minaj Like Instagram Comments Making Fun Of One Another

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Meek Mill & Nicki Minaj Like Instagram Comments Making Fun Of One Another

organizations.name: meek mill & nicki minaj like instagram

text: Home > Music > Meek Mill & Nicki Minaj Like Instagram Comments Making Fun Of One Another Meek Mill & Nicki Minaj Like Instagram Comments Making Fun Of One Another 1 3 350 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Mar 1, 2017 at 01:28am Both Meek Mill & Nicki Minaj take petty jabs at one another by liking particular IG posts. It looks like Nicki Minaj & Meek Mill have been taking a certain “liking” to some Instagram comments. On Tuesday morning, Meek Mill posted a pic on Instagram of him and Trey Songz in the studio, which could be alluding of new music on the way or Meek just being petty now that Trey & Nicki had choice words following Remy’s “Shether” diss over the weekend. Either way, it appears Nicki isn’t too fond of the picture Meek posted, and ended up liking a fan’s comment under the post about how sad the two were for trying to take down one bad bitch. “Pretty sad when all these Mfers have to come together to try to take down one bad bitch. Let’s see who's left standing with all that doe in the end tho,” Nicki liked. In the minutes/hour following, TheShadeRoom caught Meek reciprocating the action right back to Nicki by liking a fan’s comment about how Nicki’s “ass dropped,” or so it looks in the recent video shoot with Future. Check out all the pettiness on full display (below). A post shared by DJ Akademiks (@akadmiks) on Feb 28, 2017 at 7:25pm PST A post shared by The Shade Room (@theshaderoom) on Feb 28, 2017 at 8:02pm PST
